abstract: Career criminal Ralph J Phillips, who killed New York State trooper after escaping from jail in 2006, is charged with violating prison regulations at Clinton Correctional Facility in Dannemora, NY, after search of his cell turns up prohibited items believed to be escape tools.
snippet: Ralph J. Phillips, who killed a state trooper after escaping from jail, is accused of having escape tools in his prison cell.
lead_paragraph: Ralph J. Phillips, who killed a state trooper after escaping from jail, is accused of having escape tools in his prison cell.

headline.main: Inmate Who Killed Trooper Is Said to Have Escape Tools
headline.print_headline: Inmate Who Killed Trooper Is Said to Have Escape Tools
headline.seo: Ralph Phillips, Who Killed Trooper, Is Accused of Harboring Escape Tools in Dannemora Prison
